altTitles.ja: 地獄の軍団

description.en:
A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing 
the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.

altTitles.ja: ひびちかタイム

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

title.en: A Sinner of the Deep Sea

altTitles.ja: アビスアジュールの罪人

description.en: The ocean covers about 70 percent of the earth’s surface—a whole world, yet unknown to humanity…and in its depths a nation, thousands of meters beneath the waves. There, the mermaid Jo has been whiling away her days in peace. But that tranquility is shattered when her friend Ryuu is imprisoned for breaking the gravest of undersea laws: Their existence must be kept hidden from the people above. But why would Ryuu let the secret slip? And who did she tell? The curtain rises on Jo’s adventure to save her friend—and on a story of love…?!
description.pt-br: Por muitos séculos, Tritões e sereias tem vivido nas profundezas do oceano – 4.000 metros abaixo da superfície – onde a humanidade não pode encontrá-los. No entanto, a vida de uma sereia é virada de cabeça para baixo quando sua melhor amiga se apaixona por um humano.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/648136)
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

title.en: Kuroko no Basket - Hajimari no Closing Credits (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

altTitles.ja: 小さい僕の春

description.en: Suzuki Souta, a high school boy on the school volleyball team, is interested in his classmate Shinonome Asahi, a member of the girls' volleyball team. She thought of him as a good volleyball player, so she has been seeking him out every day. Souta was a keen volleyball player until junior high. However, because of his height, he could never become the spiker he longed to be. As a result, he got into the habit of giving up on things. Souta's high school life: Will he meekly accept what he cannot have? Or will he try to become a man who can stand with Asahi? Youth is a series of choices. Please, Souta, hang in there and do your best!

altTitles.ja: アプリコットファズ

description.en:
After school, the secret talk between girls starts today, too. The class madonna, Nanba Rinon, confides to the introvert Furutsuji about the violence she's suffering on a daily basis from her father... To indulge herself in the pleasure of self-pity. 
And Furutsuji who comforts Rinon with deep compassion. However, there's malice lurking inside that smile...
She's realized Rinon's [REDACTED].

It starts with a mountain. A strategic leader gets isekai-ed into a war dynasty. He only has a group of members who were planning to ditch him. Facing this war era, he thinks of stealing food and girls to live a king’s life. He is hot-blooded, picks fights with war heroes. How will he bring chaos to the war? Will he be able to rise up high?

altTitles.ja: あい・らぶ・鬼姫！

description.en: Reuniting with a First Love After 10 Years! Hyun Jiwoo, once a star on the Seongeon High School baseball team, faced a heartbreaking split when his junior and lover, Choi Sunho, unexpectedly left for the United States. Ten years later, Jiwoo has buried his emotions and thrown himself into his work, still haunted by the pain of that sudden separation. But his world is turned upside down when Sunho, the first love who shattered his heart, reappears—as a short-term part-time worker with a wild streak and a taste for liquor!

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

description.en:
Han Haneul, who dreams of being in a campus romance, witnesses a drug deal involving a crazy-looking man. Shaken to the core, Hanuel desperately flees… However, as if by fate, he encounters the drug dealer, Choi Dajung, again in a club he joined to follow his favorite sunbae. And somehow, Dajung ends up at his apartment…?! Get ready for a sweet, fluffy romance with a head-in-the-clouds Haneul and the unexpectedly charming Dajung, spinning into a warm and fuzzy unrequited love!
#CampusDrama #Comedy #Cuteness #Misunderstandings #UnrequitedLove #YoungerSeme #OlderUke #PetiteUke #VirginSeme

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

altTitles.ja: 伝書鳥の王女様

description.en:
Zelle, the eighth royal princess of Roymonde, who was driven to the brink of defeat in the war. She was kidnapped by the enemy, and when she woke up... She became a bird?!

Fortunately or unfortunately, as the messenger bird of Commander-in-Chief, Valhayle! She struggles for her country even though she is in a bird’s body.

But you can't even do as much as treat me like a bird!!

---
After losing consciousness while fleeing the war raging in Roymund Kingdom, Princess Zeline wakes up in the body of a messenger falcon! She’s now the bird in charge of delivering information for Commander Valhyle and his army, who are searching for the remaining royal descendants. She may be tiny and feathered, but Zeline is determined to use her missions to find out what happened to her family. Can this little birdie gain the skeptical commander’s trust and give her kingdom new wings?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EB%A0%B9%EC%83%88-%EC%99%95%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2531), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57066133)

description.id:
Seingatku terakhir kali aku tertangkap oleh pasukan musuh saat berusaha melarikan diri.
Padahal aku tidak memiliki ingatan mati, tapi aneh sekali tiba-tiba aku terbangun menjadi seekor elang di markas militer negaraku sendiri. Bagaimana nasib saudara-saudaraku yang sama-sama lari menyelamatkan diri dari serangan musuh?
Satu-satunya cara agar aku bisa mendapatkan informasi adalah dengan tetap berada di dekat Rumares Balhail, panglima kejam ini. Tapi permasalahannya sekarang adalah aku sekarang seekor burung! tidak ada yang bisa kulakukan selain membantu membawakan pesan pada pasukan sekutu sekaligus mencari keberadaan saudara-saudaraku.
Aku harap mereka masih hidup agar kami bisa lebih mudah membangkitkan negara kami sendiri! Aku akan melakukan apa pun asal itu demi negaraku!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EB%A0%B9%EC%83%88-%EC%99%95%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2531), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57066133)

description.ja:
戦争で敗北に追い込まれたロイモンド王国の第８王女ゼルイネ。 敵に捕まり目を覚ますと...鳥になっていた!? それも幸か不幸か、味方の総司令官・バルハイルの伝書鳥に！ 鳥の姿になっても、国の復興のために手を尽くす彼女だが… 鳥扱いするのはもうやめてー！ 「クエエエッ!!」

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EB%A0%B9%EC%83%88-%EC%99%95%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2531), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57066133)

description.ko:
전쟁으로 패망 직전에 몰린 로이몬드의 여덟 번째 왕녀 제르.
적군에게 납치됐다 깨어나 보니… 새가 됐다?!

다행인지 불행인지 그것도 총사령관 ‘발하일’의 전령새가!
비록 새의 몸이지만 나라를 위해 고군분투하는 그녀.

하지만 진짜 새 취급도 정도껏 하라고!!
“궤에에엑!"

---

description.uk:
Зелле, восьма королівська принцеса Роймонда, яка була доведена до межі поразки у війні. Її викрав ворог, а коли вона прокинулася… Стала птахом?! На щастя чи на жаль, як птах-вісник Головнокомандувача, Валхайла! Вона бореться за свою країну, навіть перебуваючи в тілі птаха. Але ви не можете навіть ставитися до мене, як до птаха!! "Гвіккк!"

---

title.en: After Constantly Dying, I Became the Emperor Venerable

altTitles.en: After Constantly Trying to Die, I Became the Emperor Venerable

altTitles.zh: 不断作死后,我成了万人迷帝尊

description.en:
Di Yange traveled to a novel with a male protagonist, and the only way to return to her original world is to commit suicide.
In order to return home as soon as possible, she disguised herself as a man, and tried every means to oppose the protagonist and become a brother to the villain. She even deliberately didn't say much, didn't explain, and did her own thing without any emotions in order to attract hatred.
But... no matter how aloof the emperor is, he can't stand the crowd of immortals who love to make up their own stories!
As the vests of the past fell off one by one, Di Yange's "path to becoming an emperor by committing suicide" also slowly unfolded in front of everyone...
Di Yange: It's better to die than to send the emperor, thank you.
The immortals: He actually said thank you to me, really, I cried to death.

altTitles.ja: WOLF IN THE HOUSE：ウルフ・イン・ザ・ハウス

description.en: After ending an on-again, off-again relationship of 10 years, Minsuk decides to foster a Siberian husky named Bexan to mark the start of his new single life. He can’t wait to cuddle with his new furry roommate, take him on walks, and play fetch. But Bexan is no ordinary dog…and when night falls, Minsuk is in for a surprise.
description.pl:
: ||  
Po zakończeniu 10-letniego związku, Minsuk postanawia zaadoptować syberyjskiego husky, o imieniu Bexan, aby uczcić początek jego nowego życia jako singiel. Nie może się doczekać, by przytulić się do swojego futrzanego współlokatora, zabierać go na spacery i bawić się z nim w aport. Lecz Bexan nie jest zwykłym psem…i kiedy zapada zmrok, na Minsuka czeka niespodzianka.||  
  
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/with)

description.en: What should you do when a junior colleague of the same sex confesses their feelings for you, and is persistently pursuing you? Not only does voice actor Mason find himself in such a situation, but also unexpectedly discovers that this junior is the very same doujinshi artist behind the R-rated fan comics featuring the two of them! Furthermore, the two are set to work together on a BL radio drama...

altTitles.hu: Még akkor is, ha a kétségbeesés megvisel

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

altTitles.ja: 日常

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

title.en: Will the Sea King Tip the Boat Today?

description.en:
I thought I could swim into this beautiful jiejie's heart, but I didn't realize she was a sea king! Encountering love and turmoil from the very first page, Li Haijue decided to let go of herself—to embrace the role of Sea King—and experience a different kind of love story! At the same time, this hidden, mysterious world begins to unravel itself. What does the “Sea King” title on top of her head truly mean..?

TL/N: “Sea King” is Chinese slang for someone who keeps many lovers at the same time! Much like how a King of the Sea rules over all the fish, so does Haijue over the people in her world.

altTitles.en: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch

description.en: The world is plunged into doomsday. The entire doomsday world has turned into a cruel evolutionary game! This is the greatest opportunity and trial ground for mankind, and it is also the amusement park of gods and demons! Chen Bai was reborn and returned
description.zh: 全球陷入末日笼罩。 整个末日世界，变成了一场残酷的进化游戏！ 这是人类最大的机缘与试炼场，也是神魔的游乐园！ 陈白重生回到了末日开始的十天前！ 直接注射丧尸病毒， 觉醒SSS天赋：病毒君王！ 掌控病毒开始一条与众不同的进化之路！

altTitles.ja: ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ

description.en:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, "Give me your life."

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

title.en: Himegasaki Sakurako wa Kyou mo Fubin Kawaii

altTitles.en: Sakurako Himegasaki is Still Pitiably Cute Today

altTitles.ja: 姫ヶ崎櫻子は今日も不憫可愛い

altTitles.zh-hk: 姬之崎櫻子今天也惹人憐愛

altTitles.en: Himegasaki Sakurako Is Pitiably Cute Today Too

altTitles.ja-ro: Himegasaki Sakurako ha Kyou mo Fubin Kawaii

description.en: An average romcom told from the perspective of the losing childhood friend. Other things happen as well.

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

altTitles.pt: Eu me tornei a irmã mais nova de um protagonista obsessivo arrependido

altTitles.uk: Головний герой у відчаї, а я стала його молодшою сестрою
Я стала молодшою сестрою героя, сповненого жалю

altTitles.id: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นน้องสาวของพระเอกวายตัวร้ายสายกลับใจ

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ公子の妹になりました

altTitles.zh: 穿成后悔偏执狂的妹妹

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?

A collection of short stories revolving around the relationships between Pokemon and characters from the THE iDOLM@STER franchise. 

---

Note: The stories posted here are incomplete and are only taken from the artist's X account. 
If you want more Pokemon stories, be sure to buy their comics online when available.

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

description.en:
After suffering from a stalker, Yoon Ji-gu becomes extremely wary of people. Just in time, a man with a strange sexual orientation moved into the neighbor's house...?
"Looks like there's a pervert living next door..."
In reality, Lee Yeo-woon and Yoon Ji-gu are suspicious neighbors who are full of misunderstandings.
In the game, the couple neutaaaa (Lee Yeo-woon) and ji9byeol.
How will the relationship between the two change in and out of the game and reality?

"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

altTitles.ja: ギャングキング

description.en:
The lead character, Jimmy (Katsuya Oonishi) is an art student at Bara-Gaku ('Bara Juuji Gakuin'; Rose-Cross Academy). When he was little, he almost drowned, but was saved by a tattoo artist. From that day, Jimmy vowed to become a tattoo artist (because tattoos signify 'a hero' to him).  
  
Jimmy's a decent person by nature, but because of the people he hangs out with, he's considered a delinquent. Banko, his partner-in-crime, is a shrewed kid; he sells information on the popular girls (phone numbers, likes and dislikes, etc) in the area. Despite the delinquent exterior, Banko is actually really smart and has broad general knowledge.  
  
As the story progresses, Jimmy and Banko meet new people and they form a gang of their own; along the way they bump heads with other gangs from other schools/districts. This manga is not the typical highschool-slice-of-life story; it's got a rougher edge! This manga depicts some high school delinquents trying to get through high school life and gang fights. Okay no, mostly just gang fights.

altTitles.ja: コハエース＋
コハエースプラス

description.en: One year after the previous Koha-Ace, they're back at it again! The curtain draws on another disrespectful battle royale that TYPE-MOON somehow manages to tolerate! (Sequel to Koha-Ace)

In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.ja: カッコウの許嫁

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

title.en: Conquering the Academy with Just a Sashimi Knife.

altTitles.en: I Took Over the Academy With a Single Sashimi Knife
Chewed Up the Academy With a Bag of Sashimi
Chew the Academy With a Sashimi Stick

description.en:
"If I slash, it will be cut."

I, who was once called the best swordsman in the nation, have ended up in a mobile game I've only spent money on a few times. And I’ve even received the blessing of the 'Sword God'!

But… the only weapon I can use is a sashimi knife?

Just one minute a day. I become a Sword Saint with a sashimi knife.

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin 1-kai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

altTitles.id: Tereinkarnasi sebagai Pangeran yang Mengecewakan: Saat Ini Sit-up Sekali pun Tak Bisa, tapi akan Kucoba 'tuk Diet dan Selamatkan Dunia

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince
That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince: Right Now I Can't Even Do One Sit-up, but I'll Try to Lose Weight and Save the World

altTitles.ja: 転生先が残念王子だった件 ～今は腹筋１回もできないけど痩せて異世界救います～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin 1-kai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu
Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin Ikkai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince～I can't do a single sit-up now, but I'm going to lose weight and save another world～

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

description.en: Orphaned at a young age, and barely scraping by, Baek Hoyeon. After ghosts have been finding their way to Hoyeon, night after night tormenting him, he eventually goes to see a shaman. He is shocked after being told that 100 ghosts are haunting him. With his life on the line, he has only one choice! “…You have to do it with each of them. That is your only solution.” The only way to survive is to have sex with the ghosts! All 100 of them!! And then he meets Choi Dan, someone in a similar position as him. They come to an agreement; Choi Dan will become the vessel for the ghosts and vanquish them together. With the thought of wanting to live to see another day, the two will have to spend 100 nights together…

The day 'Daeun' went with his classmates to drink like crazy, he then went home to sleep. In his dreams, he recalls a memory of when him and ‘Seohjin’ met lips. Why did the 'mistake' he made in high school suddenly reveal itself in a dream? Daeun, who thought his feelings had finally come to rest, Encounters Seohjin, whom he's uncomfortable with. Unlike his usual self, Daeun seeks out Seohjin to ask if he made some kind of mistake while drinking, but the answer he's met with is that they just kissed...?

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

title.en: The Story of How the Girl of My Dreams Was a Stalker

altTitles.ja: 憧れのあの子がストーカーだった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Akogare no Ano Ko ga Stalker Datta Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La historia de cómo la chica de mis sueños era una acosadora

description.en:
The story of how the girl of my dreams was a stalker.

Manga by Twitter user @ku-sunok1
description.es-la: Manga del usuario de Twitter @ku_sunok1, el título es también sinopsis.
